text: Bahadur Shah may refer to *Bahadur Shah of Gujarat (died 1537) *Bahadur Shah I (1643–1712), Mughal Emperor *Bahadur Shah II (1775–1862), the last Mughal Emperor and final ruler of the Timurid house *Bahadur Nizam Shah, ruler of the Ahmadnagar Sultanate from 1596 to 1600 *Bahadur Shah, last ruler of Khandesh Sultanate *Bahadur Shah of Nepal, second son of Prithvi Narayan Shah, regent of his minor nephew king of Nepal and de facto ruler of Nepal until 1794
title: Bahadur Shah
